main event: A UFO sighting was reported on January 12, 1958, involving an object that resembled a telephone pole with changing colors and dimensions.
interesting points: The observed object was bright and changed colors from red to orange and yellow., The sighting lasted for 6 milliseconds., It was concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation., The description suggested it might be a fireball or meteor., The sighting was reported from a location approximately 1/2 to 1/2 mile from Northeast Shopping Center on Buford Highway.
sighted object: object resembling a telephone pole with changing colors
